LanguageData.IvyTeaHigh.label: ivy tea high
LanguageData.IvyTeaHigh.description: Drank ivy tea. The ivy fruit used has been refined and watered-down many times, so the tea is less like a drug and more similar to coffee. Generates a mild euphoria and sense of alertness.
LanguageData.IvyTeaAddiction.label: ivy tea addiction
LanguageData.IvyTeaAddiction.description: Approximately 60% of the Bori and Sheepawn population are addicted to ivy tea. Withdrawal will cause nausea and fatigue. \nWithout regular doses of ivy tea, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will resolve the addiction.
LanguageData.IvyTeaAddiction.stages.0.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.IvyTeaTolerance.label: ivy tea tolerance
LanguageData.IvyTeaTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to ivy tea. The more severe this tolerance is, the more ivy tea it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.IvyTeaTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.IvyTeaTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.IvyTeaTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
